price: Deε wͻka ne sε: “Adεn nti na yɛansane saa Qur’aan yi amma onipa a odi mu wͻ nkuro mmienu no mu (Maka ne Taif)?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
